field_edited_text.value:
84 Patarsco River CROSSING

C. Construction Cost

The cost of construction has been estimated on the basis of the following
divisions of construction work:—
Substructure
Superstructure
Approach Roadway
Toll Booths and Administration Building
Main Channel Pier Fenders
Lighting System for Bridge, Approach Roadway and Toll Plaza
Contingencies '

Substructure.—The cost of the substructure has been estimated by divid-
ing the work of constructing the substructure into the following classifica-
tions of construction work, at unit prices, and estimated quantities, as listed
in Tables 30 and 31.



















TABLE 30
DESCRIPTION ESTIMATED QUANTITIES UNIT PRICE AMOUNT
Approaches

Dry Excavation.................... 12,470 cu. yds. $4.00 $49,880
Timber Piles: .. iws s ssan s romvns 165,860 lin. ft. 915 151,762
1:6 Concrete (Footings)............ 5,990 cu. yds 13.60 81,464
1:6 Neat Concrete.................. 5,080 cu. yds. 15.00 76,200
Reinforcing Steel...... ............. 443,000 lbs. .05 22,150

Total Canton and Fairfield Approaches.................................. $381,456

TABLE 31
DESCRIPTION ESTIMATED QUANTITIES UNIT PRICE AMOUNT
Main River Bridge

Dry Excavation.................... 1,890 cu. yds. $3.60 $6,804
Wet Excavation.................... 75,690 cu. yds. 7.30 552,537
Tremie Concrete.................... 26,360 cu. yds. 11.35 299,186
1:6 Concrete Base.................. 14,400 cu. yds. 13.50 194,400
1:6 Neat Concrete.................. 19,350 cu. yds. 16.50 319,275
Steel “H” Piles.................... 156,700 lin. ft. 3.76 589,192
Reinforcing Steel........... .. ... .. 1,400,000 1bs. .0532 74,480
Stonie FACINE: ; uosewvs s vswusmngns 25,000 cu. ft. 3.85 96,250

Total Main River Bridge. . ....... .. ... ... . . . . . . .. . . $2,132,124





Superstructure.—The superstructure is divided into structural steel and
bridge roadway slab, the weight and area of which have been estimated, and
the total cost determined on the basis of the unit prices listed. See Table 32.
